sentences.sentence: One of his adherents complained of the stinginess of his wife.
sentences.translation: 一名弟子向他抱怨妻子小气。

sentences.sentence: In many parts South of the border, the elbow is linked to stinginess.
sentences.translation: 在墨西哥的许多地方，手肘意味着吝啬。

sentences.sentence: A man renowned for stinginess in his early years has become a great philanthropist.
sentences.translation: 在早期以小气出名的他如今已成为一个了不起的慈善家。
